what: Function to estimate autocorrelation parameters using dichotomized Gaussian simulations — estimate.autocorr.params
title: Function to estimate autocorrelation parameters using dichotomized Gaussian simulations — estimate.autocorr.params
text: function performs estimate--fit procedure process.autocorr, multiple times neuron using simulated spike rasters generated dichotomized Gaussian model neuron.

title: Function to estimate autocorrelation parameters using dichotomized Gaussian simulations — estimate.autocorr.params
code: estimate.autocorr.params(   neuron_list,   n_trials_per_sim = 300,   n_sims_per_neurons = 100,   bin_count_action = "sum",   A0 = 0.001,   tau0 = 1,   ctol = 1e-08,   max_evals = 500,   verbose = FALSE )

title: Function to estimate autocorrelation parameters using dichotomized Gaussian simulations — estimate.autocorr.params
text: neuron_list R list neuron objects. n_trials_per_sim Number trials simulate simulation (default: 300). n_sims_per_neurons Number simulations run neuron (default: 100). bin_count_action Method counting spikes bin computing autocorrelation; one "boolean", "mean", "sum" (default: "sum"). A0 Initial guess amplitude parameter exponential decay function (default: 0.001). tau0 Initial guess time constant parameter exponential decay function (default: 1.0). ctol Convergence tolerance fitting exponential decay function (default: 1e-8). max_evals Maximum number evaluations fitting exponential decay function (default: 500). verbose Logical indicating whether print progress messages (default: FALSE).

title: Function to estimate autocorrelation parameters using dichotomized Gaussian simulations — estimate.autocorr.params
text: list containing data frame autocorrelation parameter estimates (one row per simulation), data frame neuron identifiers (one row per neuron), number simulations run per neuron.

what: Load neuron data from raster file — load.rasters.as.neurons
title: Load neuron data from raster file — load.rasters.as.neurons
text: function loads spike raster data data frame CSV file converts unique cell neuron object. raster data frame must contain columns cell identifier, spike time milliseconds, trial number. Optional metadata columns can also included.

title: Load neuron data from raster file — load.rasters.as.neurons
code: load.rasters.as.neurons(   raster_df,   bin_size = 20,   sample_rt = 10000,   time_cutoff = Inf )

title: Load neuron data from raster file — load.rasters.as.neurons
text: raster_df Data frame (file name csv importable ), row spike; must columns: cell, time_in_ms, trial; optional columns: recording_name, hemisphere, genotype, sex, region, age. bin_size Size time bins milliseconds (default: 20). sample_rt Sample rate default unit neuron objects, Hz (default: 1e4). time_cutoff Maximum time (ms) include spikes; spikes occurring time excluded (default: Inf).

title: Load neuron data from raster file — load.rasters.as.neurons
text: list neuron objects, one per unique cell raster data.

title: Initialize neuron object — new_neuron
text: function initializes new neuron object specified parameters. neuron objects main tools running autocorrelation analyses spike data.

title: Initialize neuron object — new_neuron
code: new_neuron(   id_num = 0,   recording_name = "not_provided",   type = "generic",   genotype = "not_provided",   sex = "not_provided",   hemi = "not_provided",   region = "not_provided",   age = "not_provided",   sim = FALSE,   unit_time = "ms",   unit_sample_rate = "Hz",   unit_data = "mV",   t_per_bin = 1,   sample_rate = 10000 )

title: Initialize neuron object — new_neuron
text: id_num Numeric identifier neuron (default: 0). recording_name // Recording () neuron based (default: "not_provided"). type Modeled electrophysiology neuron, e.g. "generic", "blackbox" "LIF", "McCullochPitts", "excitatory", "inhibitory", etc. (default: "generic"). genotype Genotype animal, e.g. "WT", "KO", "MECP2", "transgenic", etc. (default: "not_provided"). sex Sex animal (default: "not_provided"). hemi Hemisphere neuron neuron located, e.g. "left", "right" (default: "not_provided"). region Brain region neuron located, e.g. "V1", "M1", "CA1", "PFC", etc. (default: "not_provided"). age Age animal, e.g. "P0", "P7", "P14", "adult", etc. (default: "not_provided"). sim Logical indicating neuron simulated (TRUE) recorded (FALSE) (default: FALSE). unit_time Unit time spike raster recording data, e.g. "ms", "s", etc. (default: "ms"). unit_sample_rate Unit sample rate spike raster recording data, e.g. "Hz", "kHz", etc. (default: "Hz"). unit_data Unit data spike raster recording data, e.g. "mV", "spike", etc. (default: "mV"). t_per_bin Time (units) per bin, e.g., 1 ms per bin (default: 1.0).
